attributes.action: Launch a full investigation into the Northern Rock business model and bring those responsible to justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An immediate enquiry into the failings of the business model at Northen Rock must take a broad perspective of all those involved, including the previous management. The hard working staff, shareholders and British people in general deserve to know what went wrong and that lessons will be learnt.  Justice should be brought upon responsable indviduals"


Northern Rock has posted £168 million loss in 2007 compared to £627 million profit in 2006 a fall of £795 million.

More than £30 billion of taxpayers money, (£500 from every man woman and child in the UK) has been used to save it.

Nick Leeson went to prison for losing £1200 million at Barings 

Alan Applegarth however has a £2.2 million pension pot and is due to be paid £760,000 for achieving the effective failure of Northern Rock.

2000 people are likely to lose their jobs on probably much less generous terms.
